panels.description: Data recency for the current dashboard context.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
exec_view AS (
  SELECT dashboard_generated_at
  FROM reporting.rpt_executive_dashboard
  WHERE dashboard_month = (SELECT month_key FROM selected_key)
),
time_window_label AS (
  SELECT CASE '${time_window}'
    WHEN 'ytd' THEN 'Year to Date'
    WHEN 'trailing_12m' THEN 'Trailing 12 Months'
    ELSE 'Latest Month'
  END AS window_label
)
SELECT
  (SELECT window_label FROM time_window_label) AS "Time Window",
  to_char((SELECT month_date FROM selected_period), 'Mon YYYY') AS "Data Through",
  to_char(MAX(exec_view.dashboard_generated_at), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "Last Refresh"
FROM exec_view;

panels.title: Data Freshness

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT forecasted_next_month_net_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_scores AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.30 THEN 'Excellent'
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.20 THEN 'Strong'
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.15 THEN 'Good'
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.10 THEN 'Fair'
      ELSE 'Needs Attention'
    END AS savings_rating
  FROM current_budget cb
),
summary AS (
  SELECT
    to_char((SELECT month_date FROM selected_period), 'Mon YYYY') AS month_label,
    CASE
      WHEN cb.net_cash_flow >= 0 THEN 'Positive'
      ELSE 'Negative'
    END AS health_rating,
    COALESCE(ccf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow, 0) AS forecast_value
  FROM current_budget cb
  LEFT JOIN current_cf ccf ON TRUE
)
SELECT CONCAT('📊 Financial Summary for ', summary.month_label,
              ' | Net Cash Flow: ', summary.health_rating,
              ' | Next Month Forecast: $', ROUND(summary.forecast_value)::text) AS summary
FROM summary;

panels.description: Overall financial health scoreboard. Each bar reflects raw ratios from the selected month: savings performance is net cash flow ÷ income, cash-flow status comes from the cash-flow analysis state machine, and net-worth progress tracks the wealth milestone. The composite score weights net worth 30%, savings 30%, and cash flow 40%.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
scores AS (
  SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.30 THEN 100
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.20 THEN 80
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.15 THEN 60
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.10 THEN 40
      WHEN cb.savings_rate_percent >= 0.05 THEN 25
      ELSE 10
    END AS savings_score,
    CASE coalesce(cnw.wealth_milestone, '')
      WHEN 'High Net Worth' THEN 100
      WHEN 'Building Wealth' THEN 80
      WHEN 'Positive Net Worth' THEN 60
      WHEN 'Rebuilding Phase' THEN 40
      WHEN 'Starting Out' THEN 25
      ELSE 40
    END AS net_worth_score,
    CASE coalesce(ccf.cash_flow_status, '')
      WHEN 'Strong Positive' THEN 100
      WHEN 'Positive' THEN 80
      WHEN 'Neutral' THEN 60
      WHEN 'Negative' THEN 40
      WHEN 'Critical' THEN 20
      ELSE 40
    END AS cash_flow_score
  FROM current_budget cb
  LEFT JOIN current_cf ccf ON TRUE
  LEFT JOIN current_nw cnw ON TRUE
),
combined AS (
  SELECT
    ROUND(0.3 * COALESCE(net_worth_score, 0) + 0.3 * COALESCE(savings_score, 0) + 0.4 * COALESCE(cash_flow_score, 0)) AS financial_health,
    savings_score,
    net_worth_score,
    cash_flow_score
  FROM scores
)
SELECT financial_health AS "Financial Health",
       savings_score AS "Savings Performance",
       net_worth_score AS "Net Worth Progress",
       cash_flow_score AS "Cash Flow Status"
FROM combined;

panels.title: Financial Health Scores
Key Executive KPIs

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT net_cash_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_budget AS (
  SELECT net_cash_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT forecasted_next_month_net_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_cf AS (
  SELECT forecasted_next_month_net_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
)
SELECT 'Net Cash Flow' AS metric,
       cb.net_cash_flow AS current_value,
       COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, cb.net_cash_flow) AS previous_value,
       cb.net_cash_flow - COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0) AS delta_value,
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (cb.net_cash_flow - COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pb.net_cash_flow), 0)
       END AS delta_ratio
FROM current_budget cb LEFT JOIN previous_budget pb ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Forecast (Next Month)' AS metric,
       ccf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow,
       COALESCE(pcf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow, ccf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow),
       ccf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow - COALESCE(pcf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow, 0),
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pcf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (ccf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow - COALESCE(pcf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pcf.forecasted_next_month_net_flow), 0)
       END
FROM current_cf ccf LEFT JOIN previous_cf pcf ON TRUE;

panels.description: Cash-oriented KPIs with raw values; Δ Ratio shows change vs the previous month.

Savings and expense ratios for the selected month. Savings rate values are raw ratios (0–1) of net cash flow to income across the monthly, 3‑month rolling, and year‑to‑date views. Expense ratio is total outflows divided by inflows; lower numbers signal tighter expense control.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
rolling AS (
  SELECT to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date,
         savings_rate_percent,
         AVG(savings_rate_percent) OVER (ORDER BY to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS savings_rate_3m
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_roll AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM rolling
  WHERE month_date = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
)
SELECT 'Savings Rate (Monthly)' AS metric_label, current_budget.savings_rate_percent AS value FROM current_budget
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Savings Rate (3M Avg)', COALESCE(current_roll.savings_rate_3m, current_budget.savings_rate_percent) FROM current_budget LEFT JOIN current_roll ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Savings Rate (YTD)', CASE WHEN current_budget.ytd_income = 0 THEN 0 ELSE current_budget.ytd_net_cash_flow / current_budget.ytd_income END FROM current_budget
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Expense Ratio (%)', current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio FROM current_cf;

panels.title: Savings & Expense Performance
Health & Risk KPIs

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT net_worth_health_score
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_nw AS (
  SELECT net_worth_health_score
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
),
current_alerts AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE needs_attention_flag), 0) AS accounts_at_risk
  FROM reporting.rpt_account_performance
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_alerts AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE needs_attention_flag), 0) AS accounts_at_risk
  FROM reporting.rpt_account_performance
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
)
SELECT 'Net Worth Health Score' AS metric,
       cnw.net_worth_health_score AS current_value,
       COALESCE(pnw.net_worth_health_score, cnw.net_worth_health_score) AS previous_value,
       cnw.net_worth_health_score - COALESCE(pnw.net_worth_health_score, 0) AS delta_value,
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pnw.net_worth_health_score, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (cnw.net_worth_health_score - COALESCE(pnw.net_worth_health_score, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pnw.net_worth_health_score), 0)
       END AS delta_ratio
FROM current_nw cnw LEFT JOIN previous_nw pnw ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Accounts At Risk' AS metric,
       ca.accounts_at_risk::double precision,
       COALESCE(pa.accounts_at_risk, ca.accounts_at_risk)::double precision,
       (ca.accounts_at_risk - COALESCE(pa.accounts_at_risk, 0))::double precision,
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pa.accounts_at_risk, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (ca.accounts_at_risk - COALESCE(pa.accounts_at_risk, 0))::double precision / NULLIF(ABS(pa.accounts_at_risk)::double precision, 0)
       END
FROM current_alerts ca LEFT JOIN previous_alerts pa ON TRUE;

panels.description: Score and risk KPIs expressed as raw values; Δ Ratio captures relative change where applicable.

Expense Control Score translates your outflow-to-inflow ratio into a 0-100 scale. Scores above 80 mean expenses are ≤90% of income (strong control). 55–70 means you’re spending roughly 100–110% of income (monitor closely). A 10 indicates expenses exceed 150% of income—an immediate signal that cash burn is unsustainable.
panels.title: Expense Control Score

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT outflow_to_inflow_ratio
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
)
SELECT 'Expense Control Score' AS metric_label,
       CASE
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 0.80 THEN 95
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 0.90 THEN 85
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 1.00 THEN 70
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 1.10 THEN 55
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 1.25 THEN 40
         WHEN current_cf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio <= 1.50 THEN 25
         ELSE 10
       END AS value
FROM current_cf;

panels.description: Key monthly financial figures: Income (total monthly earnings), Expenses (total monthly spending), Net Cash Flow (income minus expenses), Monthly Savings (amount saved), Net Worth (total assets minus debts), Liquid Assets (readily available cash/investments).

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
)
SELECT
  ROUND(cb.total_income, 2) AS monthly_income,
  ROUND(cb.total_expenses, 2) AS monthly_expenses,
  ROUND(cb.net_cash_flow, 2) AS monthly_net_cash_flow,
  ROUND(cb.total_income - cb.total_expenses, 2) AS monthly_total_savings,
  ROUND(cnw.net_worth, 2) AS current_net_worth,
  ROUND(cnw.liquid_assets, 2) AS liquid_assets
FROM current_budget cb
LEFT JOIN current_nw cnw ON TRUE;

panels.title: Monthly Financial Snapshot

panels.description: Monthly net cash flow, 3-month rolling average, and next-month forecast through the selected period.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
cash_history AS (
  SELECT to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date,
         net_cash_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
),
cash_with_avg AS (
  SELECT month_date,
         net_cash_flow,
         AVG(net_cash_flow) OVER (ORDER BY month_date ROWS BETWEEN 2 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS avg_3m
  FROM cash_history
),
forecast_history AS (
  SELECT to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date,
         forecasted_next_month_net_flow
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
),
windowed AS (
  SELECT c.month_date,
         c.net_cash_flow,
         c.avg_3m,
         f.forecasted_next_month_net_flow,
         ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY c.month_date DESC) AS rn
  FROM cash_with_avg c
  LEFT JOIN forecast_history f ON f.month_date = c.month_date
  WHERE c.month_date <= (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
)
SELECT month_date AS "time",
       net_cash_flow AS "Net Cash Flow",
       avg_3m AS "3-Month Avg",
       forecasted_next_month_net_flow AS "Forecast Next Month"
FROM windowed
WHERE rn <= 12
ORDER BY month_date;

panels.title: Cash Flow Trend (12 Months)

panels.description: Breakdown of your financial position: Total Assets (all owned assets), Total Liabilities (all debts), Net Worth (assets minus liabilities), Debt-to-Asset Ratio (debt percentage - lower is better).

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
)
SELECT
  ROUND(total_assets, 2) AS total_assets,
  ROUND(total_liabilities, 2) AS total_liabilities,
  ROUND(net_worth, 2) AS current_net_worth,
  ROUND(debt_to_asset_ratio * 100, 1) AS debt_to_asset_ratio_percent
FROM current_nw;

panels.title: Asset & Liability Snapshot
Month-over-Month Cash Changes

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
)
SELECT 'Net Cash Flow' AS metric,
       cb.net_cash_flow AS current_value,
       COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, cb.net_cash_flow) AS previous_value,
       cb.net_cash_flow - COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0) AS delta_value,
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (cb.net_cash_flow - COALESCE(pb.net_cash_flow, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pb.net_cash_flow), 0)
       END AS delta_ratio
FROM current_budget cb LEFT JOIN previous_budget pb ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Net Worth',
       cnw.net_worth,
       COALESCE(pnw.net_worth, cnw.net_worth),
       cnw.net_worth - COALESCE(pnw.net_worth, 0),
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pnw.net_worth, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (cnw.net_worth - COALESCE(pnw.net_worth, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pnw.net_worth), 0)
       END
FROM current_nw cnw LEFT JOIN previous_nw pnw ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Liquid Assets',
       cnw.liquid_assets,
       COALESCE(pnw.liquid_assets, cnw.liquid_assets),
       cnw.liquid_assets - COALESCE(pnw.liquid_assets, 0),
       CASE WHEN COALESCE(pnw.liquid_assets, 0) = 0 THEN NULL
            ELSE (cnw.liquid_assets - COALESCE(pnw.liquid_assets, 0)) / NULLIF(ABS(pnw.liquid_assets), 0)
       END
FROM current_nw cnw LEFT JOIN previous_nw pnw ON TRUE;

panels.description: Cash-based month-over-month changes for the selected period. Δ Ratio shows the percent change relative to the previous month when available.

panels.title: Month-over-Month Rate Changes

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
previous_cf AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM previous_period)
)
SELECT 'Savings Rate' AS metric,
       cb.savings_rate_percent AS current_value,
       COALESCE(pb.savings_rate_percent, cb.savings_rate_percent) AS previous_value,
       cb.savings_rate_percent - COALESCE(pb.savings_rate_percent, 0) AS delta_value
FROM current_budget cb LEFT JOIN previous_budget pb ON TRUE
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Expense Ratio' AS metric,
       ccf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio,
       COALESCE(pcf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio, ccf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio),
       ccf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio - COALESCE(pcf.outflow_to_inflow_ratio, 0)
FROM current_cf ccf LEFT JOIN previous_cf pcf ON TRUE;

panels.description: Rate metrics expressed as raw ratios (0-1). Grafana formatting applies the percent view.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
exec_view AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM reporting.rpt_executive_dashboard
  WHERE dashboard_month = (SELECT month_key FROM selected_key)
)
SELECT COALESCE(ev.priority_recommendation, 'No recommendation available for this period.') AS "Priority Recommendation",
       COALESCE(ev.accounts_with_issues, 'None flagged') AS "Accounts Needing Attention"
FROM exec_view ev
UNION ALL
SELECT 'No recommendation available for this period.' AS "Priority Recommendation", 'None flagged' AS "Accounts Needing Attention"
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM exec_view);

panels.description: Additional performance indicators: Current Savings Tier (performance category), Net Worth Health Score (0-100), Accounts Needing Attention (count of problematic accounts), Cash Flow Status (current trend assessment).

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
selected_key AS (
  SELECT to_char(month_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month_key
  FROM selected_period
),
previous_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
  WHERE month_date < (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_budget AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_cf AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_cash_flow_analysis
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
current_nw AS (
  SELECT *, to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
account_alerts AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE needs_attention_flag), 0) AS accounts_needing_attention
  FROM reporting.rpt_account_performance
  WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM selected_period)
),
exec_view AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM reporting.rpt_executive_dashboard
  WHERE dashboard_month = (SELECT month_key FROM selected_key)
)
SELECT 'Overall Rating' AS metric, COALESCE(ev.overall_financial_health_rating, 'n/a') AS status, 'Composite of savings, cash flow, and net worth signals.' AS detail
FROM exec_view ev
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Savings Tier', COALESCE(ev.current_savings_tier, 'n/a'), 'Benchmark category for latest savings rate.'
FROM exec_view ev
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Cash Flow Status', COALESCE(ccf.cash_flow_status, 'n/a'), 'Health of current month cash flow vs historical pattern.'
FROM current_cf ccf
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Net Worth Phase', COALESCE(cnw.wealth_milestone, 'n/a'), 'Stage of wealth-building progress based on assets and liabilities.'
FROM current_nw cnw
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Accounts Requiring Attention', COALESCE(CAST(aa.accounts_needing_attention AS TEXT), '0'), 'Number of accounts flagged for manual review.'
FROM account_alerts aa;

panels.title: Status Highlights

options.content:
### How to Read
- Use the month selector to compare any historical period; "Latest" always reflects the newest closed month.
- Time windows: Latest = most recent complete month; trend panels show trailing 12 months; rolling averages use last 3 complete months.
- Rates are returned as true ratios (0–1); keep formatting adjustments in Grafana rather than multiplying by 100 in SQL.
- Start with low scores or large negative deltas, then drill into linked dashboards for root-cause detail.
- Forecasts are forward-looking cash expectations; plan around the trajectory, not a single month.

panels.description: Quick view of data-quality blockers for the selected period.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
),
selected_period AS (
  SELECT CASE
           WHEN '${dashboard_period}' = 'Latest' OR coalesce('${dashboard_period}', '') = ''
             THEN (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period)
           ELSE to_date('${dashboard_period}' || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD')
         END AS month_date
),
period_bounds AS (
  SELECT month_date,
         month_date AS month_start,
         (month_date + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day')::date AS month_end
  FROM selected_period
),
stale_accounts AS (
  SELECT COUNT(*) AS stale_accounts
  FROM reporting.dim_accounts_enhanced
  WHERE account_last_transaction_date < (SELECT month_end FROM period_bounds) - INTERVAL '45 days'
),
transfer_pairs AS (
  SELECT
    transaction_date::date AS txn_date,
    transaction_amount_abs AS amount_abs,
    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_amount < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS out_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_amount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS in_count
  FROM reporting.fct_transactions_enhanced
  WHERE COALESCE(is_internal_transfer, FALSE)
    AND transaction_date >= (SELECT month_start FROM period_bounds)
    AND transaction_date <= (SELECT month_end FROM period_bounds)
  GROUP BY 1,2
),
unmatched_transfers AS (
  SELECT COALESCE(SUM(ABS(out_count - in_count)), 0) AS unmatched_count
  FROM transfer_pairs
),
uncategorized AS (
  SELECT uncategorized_pct
  FROM reporting.rpt_outflows_insights_dashboard
  WHERE period_date = (SELECT month_date FROM period_bounds)
)
SELECT 'Stale accounts (45d+ no activity)' AS metric,
       COALESCE((SELECT stale_accounts FROM stale_accounts), 0)::text AS value,
       'Accounts without recent transactions' AS detail
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Unmatched internal transfers',
       COALESCE((SELECT unmatched_count FROM unmatched_transfers), 0)::text,
       'Proxy count based on paired in/out amounts'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Uncategorized spend %',
       CONCAT(ROUND(COALESCE((SELECT uncategorized_pct FROM uncategorized), 0), 1), '%'),
       'Share of outflows currently uncategorized';

panels.title: Data Quality Callouts

targets.rawSql:
WITH data AS (
  SELECT
    original_memo AS merchant,
    transaction_count AS txn_count,
    ROUND(total_amount, 2) AS total_spend,
    last_transaction_date AS last_seen,
    priority_level
  FROM reporting.viz_uncategorized_transactions_with_original_memo
  ORDER BY total_amount DESC, transaction_count DESC
  LIMIT 10
)
SELECT
  merchant AS "Merchant",
  txn_count AS "Txn Count",
  total_spend AS "Total Spend",
  last_seen AS "Last Seen",
  priority_level AS "Priority"
FROM data
UNION ALL
SELECT 'None', 0, 0, NULL::date, 'N/A'
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM data);

panels.description: Monthly spending on family essentials: Groceries, Family & Kids, Health, Household

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  groceries_spending AS "Groceries",
  family_kids_spending AS "Family & Kids",
  health_spending AS "Health",
  household_spending AS "Household",
  total_family_essentials AS "Total Essentials"
FROM reporting.rpt_family_essentials
ORDER BY budget_year_month DESC
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Family Essentials (Last Month)

panels.description: Months of essential expenses covered by liquid assets. Target: 3-6 months for families with young children.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  months_essential_expenses_covered AS "Months Covered",
  coverage_status AS "Status"
FROM reporting.rpt_emergency_fund_coverage
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Emergency Fund Coverage

panels.description: Current week spending vs weekly budget target. Shows daily budget remaining for the rest of the week.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  wtd_spending AS "Week Spent",
  weekly_budget_target AS "Weekly Budget",
  daily_budget_remaining AS "Daily Budget Left",
  days_remaining_in_week AS "Days Left",
  pace_status
FROM reporting.rpt_weekly_spending_pace;

panels.title: Week-to-Date Spending Pace

list.name: dashboard_period
list.label: Month
list.definition:
SELECT month_key FROM (
  SELECT 'Latest' AS month_key, 0 AS sort_order
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT budget_year_month AS month_key, 1 AS sort_order
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
) ordered
ORDER BY sort_order, month_key DESC;
list.query:
SELECT month_key FROM (
  SELECT 'Latest' AS month_key, 0 AS sort_order
  UNION ALL
  SELECT DISTINCT budget_year_month AS month_key, 1 AS sort_order
  FROM reporting.rpt_monthly_budget_summary
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
) ordered
ORDER BY sort_order, month_key DESC;

title: Executive Financial Overview (Most Recent Complete Month)
